about: I am Sohail Khan, currently pursuing a Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Engineering.I am a passionate frontend developer with a keen eye for design and a love for crafting seamless user experiences. My dedication to my work stems from my drive to constantly improve and innovate in the field of web development.Beyond academics, I enjoy exploring new technologies, experimenting with creative web design ideas, and learning tools that enhance my development skills. I also have a deep interest in teaching and sharing knowledge, particularly in science, math, and web development. Conducting interactive and engaging sessions as a Web Development Lead has been one of the most fulfilling aspects of my journey.When I am not coding, I like playing table tennis and participating in sports activities. My goal is to become a well-rounded software developer, contributing to impactful projects while inspiring others through education and mentorship.
